name: Sol (solgame)
description:
On a paradise-like island, a mysterious storm has hit, leading to the disappearance of its civilization. Alone you will have to find out the reason for this disaster by exploring the world of Sol...

Sol is an adventure, puzzle and narrative game. It was made by students in their 3rd year Game Design Bachelor at e-artsup.

Feel free to comments your thoughts about the game !

Credits :

  • Lisa BOILEAU (Programmer)
  • Victor DIDIER (Programmer)
  • Lucas LECANTE (Level / Puzzle Designer + 2D/3D Art.)
  • Baptiste MIGLIORINI (Level / Puzzle Designer + Sound Design)
  • Sacha LEBON (Narrative Designer / Producer)
  • Lucas UNY (Environment Art. / Folliage Art.)
  • Paul OVIGNY (3D Art.)
  • Andrea GIL LARANJO (Concept Art.)
  • Dorian S (Sound Designer)
  • Tom M (Sound Designer)
